item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 2:40 AM UTC
item.description:
1. It sure looks like Meta stole a lot of books to build its AI (58 points | 28 comments)
2. Reverse engineering Call of Duty anti-cheat (131 points | 18 comments)
3. DeepSeek-R1 (1081 points | 385 comments)
4. Mixxx: GPL DJ Software (410 points | 88 comments)
5. 417-megapixel Andromeda galaxy panorama took over a decade to make (45 points | 19 comments)
6. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney, who does work for YC and startups. AMA (213 points | 281 comments)
7. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (131 points | 82 comments)
8. Optical Fresnel zone plate flat lens: colored photoresist through I-line stepper (45 points | 5 comments)
9. United States Digital Service Renamed to DOGE (14 points | 4 comments)
10. I am (not) a failure: Lessons learned from six failed startup attempts (311 points | 211 comments)
11. Using eSIMs with devices that only have a physical SIM slot via a 9eSIM SIM car (280 points | 170 comments)
12. Flag drawing with Turtle (7 points | discuss)
13. SRCL: Open-source React project to build web apps with terminal aesthetics (67 points | 11 comments)
14. Ruff: Python linter and code formatter written in Rust (69 points | 37 comments)
15. An astronomical view of Ancient Egyptian star clocks (2021) (13 points | 2 comments)

17. Celestial Navigation for Drones (144 points | 81 comments)
18. Bioinspired weather-responsive adaptive shading (20 points | 1 comment)
19. Where do those undergraduate divisibility problems come from? (109 points | 31 comments)
20. Zork: The Great Inner Workings (2020) (150 points | 56 comments)
21. I'll think twice before using GitHub Actions again (177 points | 153 comments)
22. Show HN: Personalized Duolingo (kind of) for vocabulary building (85 points | 23 comments)
23. YC X25, the spring 2025 batch (33 points | 21 comments)
24. The Making of Community Notes (2024) (34 points | 6 comments)
25. Kronotop: Redis-compatible, transactional document store backed by FoundationDB (34 points | 1 comment)
26. Show HN: Race Timing with Integrated Replay (15 points | 1 comment)
27. TypeScript enums: use cases and alternatives (153 points | 120 comments)
28. Ask HN: Seeking an IPL-V Interpreter (39 points | 9 comments)
29. I Met Paul Graham Once (747 points | 448 comments)
30. The Greenland Shark, the Longest-Living Vertebrate on Earth (2017) (41 points | 36 comments)
